body: Heritage enthusiasts are upset over the eviction of a family cemetery plot in a historic location in Malaysia. Local officials approved the property development plan in the area.
original_body: Heritage enthusiasts are upset over the eviction of a family cemetery plot in a historic location in Malaysia. Local officials approved the property development plan in the area.
title: Malaysia: Historic cemetery plot to be removed

sentence: Heritage enthusiasts are upset over the eviction of a family cemetery plot in a historic location in Malaysia.
Local officials approved the property development plan in the area.
